::Zardus/DeathStorm/Shredder::

Zardus turns away from Cyber Claw as he sees Iron Raptor transform into her 
second beast mode and attack Scavanger. He raises his launcher, aiming 
carefully at the back of the giant creature's neck, and fires.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Shredder recieves Megatron's transmission. "I'm a bit busy right now, 
Megatron." He says into his comm-link as DeathStom finally catches up to him 
and tackles him to the ground, firing several shots into his side.

Shredder rolls and jumps up, taking off again into the forest with DeathStorm 
quick on his heels. Something Megatron said had bothered him, though. He 
keeps running, trying to remember what it was.
